text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a BASE

name: RoleClassBase
title: RoleClassBase
description: A base ingredient (player) is what comprises the major part of a mixture (scoper). E.g., Water in most i.v. solutions, or Vaseline in salves. Among all ingredients of a material, there should be only one base. A base substance can, in turn, be a mixture.
